title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6155.4 - Appellate representation services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6155.4 - Appellate representation services

State Regulations
A graduated fee, based on the projected cost of preparing
individual appellate briefs or for other related appellate representation
services, will be quoted and assessed in advance of providing such services. The fee to be assessed for appellate representation services will be based on
the complexity and number of legal issues raised and the length of the
transcripts contained in the record on appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6155.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
